column16: Grannstaden acquires 156 apartments in central Umeå from Standard Gruppen i Umeå. The properties have an area of c. 8,100 sqm and were constructed between 2014 and 2016.
column25: Nya Grannstaden förvärvar i Umeå

column16: Lidéns hsa acquired the property Nöjeslivet 1 in Linköping. It consists of 2,000 sqm with a long triple net lease. The tenant is LTF, who deals with skin care and medical technology.
column25: Lidéns förvärvar Nöjeslivet 1 i Linköping

column16: Niam has sold two fully leased properties in Flemingsberg to Delcore Fastigheter. The properties consist of an ICA Maxi store and a municipal sports hall. Price is not disclosed.
column25: Niam säljer till Delcore i Flemingsberg

column16: Öresunds Industrihus has acquired two partially leased industrial properties in Helsingborg, one  in Berga Industriområde and the other in Väla Södra. The properties have a total lettable area of 6,000 sqm and 15,000 sqm of land.
column25: Öresunds Industrihus köper två i Helsingborg

column16: SBB has signed an agreement with OTPP to divest four residential properties in Sollentuna and Nacka. OTPP made the purchase together with Gordion. The underlying property value of SEK 1,179M is a 2% below SBB's valuation. It comprises a total of 426 apartments with annual rental income of SEK 65M.
column25: SBB säljer för 1,2 miljarder

column16: Platzer has the project property Högsbo 55:11 in Södra Änggården, Gothenburg, to Hub Park. The property includes building rights for a 16,000 sqm parking facility.
column25: Platzer säljer projektfastighet i Göteborg till Hub Park

column16: Axfast has acquired the property Tranhuvudet 8 at Kungsgatan 44, adjacent to Hötorget in Stockholm, from SEB Trygg Liv. The property includes Kungshallen, featuring restaurants over two floors, and comprises 6,800 sqm, with some vacant space.
column25: Axfast förvärvar Tranhuvudet 8 vid Hötorget

column16: Trophi has sold a property on Värmdö to Landia. The property comprises approximately 1,610 sq m and is fully leased to Coop, with a remaining lease term of three years.
column25: Trophi säljer litet på Värmdö

column16: Nivika Fastigheter has acquired the Rönnehagen 2 property in Ulricehamn from Connecting Capital in an off-market deal.Annuam rental income amounts to c. SEK 8.4M.
column25: Nivika förvärvar i Ulricehamn från Connecting Capital

column16: K2A has acquired 15,000 sqm of undeveloped land and building rights for c. 25,000 sqm from Akademiska Hus in Lund for SEK 138M. K2A plans for 600 homes for students and researchers.
column25: Akademiska Hus säljer i Lund till K2A för 138 mkr

column16: Nordiqus has acquired the newly developed Dalarna University campus property in Borlänge from Diös. The 13,300 sqm education facility is fully leased to the university under a long-term lease until 2039, generating around SEK 40M in annual rent.
column25: Nordiqus köper nya Dalarna högskola från Diös för 706 mkr

column16: Turbinen has acquired an industrial property in Jordbro Företagspark. The property is adjacent to their Volvo facility and is fully leased to five different parties. Annual rental value is c. SEK 9M.
column25: Turbinen förvärvar industrifastighet i Jordbro

column4: BoKlok, LICA Fastigheter, Svanberg & Sjögren Bygg
column16: Besqab has sold development rights for around 90 residential units in Ormsta, Vallentuna, to three different buyers for a total of SEK 100M. The buyers will take over the properties gradually during May and June 2025.
column25: Besqab säljer i Vallentuna i splittrad affär

column16: Vincero Fastigheter has sold two office properties in Örnsberg, Stockholm, to Klövern. The assets include a development potential for approximately 270 residential units. The buildings are currently leased to commercial tenants and the detailed development plan is expected to be adopted in Q4 2025.
column25: Vincero säljer till Klövern i Örnsberg

column16: Vasakronan has sold part of the Hugin block (Kungsängen 16:6) in Uppsala to JM. The transaction includes building rights for c.400 residential units that will be built in the part of Södra City closest to the Fyrisån river. Construction is expected to start in Q4 2026.
column25: Vasakronan säljer byggrätter till JM i Uppsala

column16: Ikea/Ingka is buying, from AMF Fastigheter, its share of Urban Escape/Gallerian where it is a tenant. In total, it concerns 7,400 sqm. The new 3D leasehold is among the first of its kind in Sweden.
column25: Ikea köper loss av AMF Fastigheter i city

column16: Handelsbröderna has sold the property Ånsta 20:166 on Åbyvägen 10 in Örebro to Christian and Gustaf Carping, who also acquired the operating wholesale business Bra Gross Sverige AB. The property comprises a lettable area of 3,149 sqm on a 2.2 hectares plot, with building rights for future development potential.
column25: Handelsbröderna avyttrar i Örebro

column16: Svenska Handelsfastigheter is acquiring the Bernstorp retail area in Burlöv from Niam for SEK 928.5M, with a fully let 48,000 sqm space and building rights for 3,000 sqm. Estimated yield is 6.2% and annual rental income amounts to c. SEK 74M.
column25: SHF köper stora Bernstorp från Niam

column16: Logistea has signed an agreement to acquire a modern 36,652 sqm logistics property in Vansbro from Apollo-backed RE NL Vansbro 1 AB for SEK 433M. The fully leased asset is used by Lyko as its Nordic central warehouse. Remaining lease term is 19 years and annual rental income is SEK 34.1M. IM 2025 yield was 7.9%,
column25: Logistea köper Lykofastighet för 430 miljoner

column16: Nystad has acquired a property in Täby Park and immediately begun construction of a 10,000 sqm school complex consisting of a primary school, preschool, and sports hall. Byängsskolan has signed a 15-year lease and plans to welcome its first students in early 2027.
column25: Nystad köper och börjar direkt bygga 10.000 kvm skola

column16: Besqab is selling a newly built nursing home in Nacka to Sefab for SEK 200M. The property was developed in 2018 and features private units, shared amenities and outdoor spaces.
column25: Besqab säljer vårdboende i Nacka

column16: Prisma Properties has acquired the Malmen 8 property in Norrköping from Corem for approximately SEK 20M. The property is fully leased to MAX, Pizza Hut, and Preem, with a total annual rent of c. SEK 1.2M and a wault of 5.5 years.
column25: Liten Max-affär när Prisma köper från Corem

column16: Lansa Fastigheter is acquiring 88 rental apartments across three buildings and a development right in Gothenburg from Bräcke Diakoni, with plans to gradually expand the partnership to enable c. 400 additional units.
column25: Lansa förvärvar 88 bostäder – med större planer

column16: Areim has acquired a 2,741 sqm logistics property in Bårhult, Landvetter from KeyFast AB. The property, built in 2020, includes a high-ceiling warehouse and office space, located along Highway 40 between Gothenburg and Borås.
column25: Areim gör mindre köp vid Landvetter

column16: Jutabo has acquired development rights from Mölndala Fastighets AB to build 38 tenant-owned apartments in the Forsåker urban development area in Mölndal, south of Gothenburg. Construction is expected to complete around 2027–2028.
column25: Jutabo köper och bygger nytt i Forsåker

column16: Art-Invest Real Estate has acquired three newly built residential buildings in Barkarby from Åke Sundvall and OBOS. The buildings total 10,000 sqm and 158 apartments, including an LSS residence with six apartments. This is Art-Invest’s second major acquisition in Barkarbystaden, following its purchase of the Barkarby Outlet in 2024.
column25: Art-Invest köper 158 lägenheter i Barkarby

column16: Romarriken Holding AB has acquired a 1,620 sqm fully leased property in central Hindås from Betonova Fastigheter. The asset, which houses an ICA grocery store and community functions, serves as a key service hub in the area. The deal marks Romarriken’s first acquisition in Hindås.
column25: Romarriken köper Ica-fastighet av Betonova

column16: Willhem has acquired two newly built residential properties in Björkekärr, Gothenburg, from K-Fastigheter for SEK 875M. The deal includes 294 apartments, a commercial unit, and 183 parking spaces across a lettable area of 16,895 sqm.
column25: Willhem köper för 875 mkr i Göteborg

column4: Bahnhof Cowork, Jonas Cederqvist, Mikael Agnehus
column16: Balder has sold the Smeden 5 property in Skövde to Bahnhof Cowork and two private investors. The 2,600 sqm building, formerly occupied by Arbetsförmedlingen, will undergo extensive renovation. While the sale price remains undisclosed, it is reported to be significant. The project is expected to be completed with tenant move-in by early 2026.
column25: Balder sålt i Skövde till coworkingaktör

column16: SLP has acquired a logistics property in Falkenberg from Astoria Fastigheter. A building of just over 38,000 sqm will be constructed. A 12-year lease agreement for the entire building has been signed with Speed Logistics. Annual rental value amounts to c. SEK 28M. Completion and tenant move-in are expected in Q2 2026.
column25: SLP förvärvar för 430 mkr i Falkenberg

column16: Skåneporten Sverige AB has acquired the Karbinen 4 retail property in central Trelleborg. The site is currently leased to a restaurant and a retail tenant.
column25: Skåneporten förvärvar mindre fastighet i Trelleborg

column16: Atlas Industrihus has acquired the industrial property Östra Malmskogen 1:44 in Linköping from Marcussons Property AB. The 1,887 sqm property is fully let to Zeppelin Cat and GDL Anläggning & Miljö AB, and sits on a 15,700 sqm plot with c. 4,000 sqm expansion potential.
column25: Atlas Industrihus förvärvat i Linköping

column16: Wåhlin Fastigheter has acquired the residential property Grönsö 1 in Farsta, Stockholm, comprising 39 apartments, one commercial space, and garages. The 2,961 sqm property was built in 1958.
column25: Wåhlin köper bostadshus i Farsta

column16: Hammarviken has acquired two modern commercial properties totaling 3,550 sqm, divided into 2,260 sqm and 1,290 sqm. The buildings, constructed in 2017, are fully leased to Mekonomen and Snabbgross.
column25: Hammarviken köper två fastigheter i Mölndal

column16: Nrep has become a strategic partner and investor in Sehlhall Fastigheter to scale its elder care real estate platform. The goal is to increase development from 2 to 8 projects annually, with a target volume of SEK 8 billion over five years. Nrep will gradually become majority owner via its fund NSF V, while existing owners remain invested.
column25: Nrep investerar i Sehlhall – snabbar på projekt för 8 miljarder

column16: RO Properties has acquired a property, formerly home to Attunda Fire Station in Sigtuna, with the intention of developing a new residential block for elderly and special-purpose housing. Zoning work is expected to begin in late 2025, with construction planned for 2028. Although the final price is undisclosed, a prior bid of SEK 35 million was submitted by RO Properties.
column25: RO Properties köper Attunda Brandstation

column16: KAB Fastigheter has acquired a fully let center property in Sävedalen, Partille Municipality, from L-Å Eveberg Fastighetsutveckling AB. Major tenants include Västra Götalandsregionen and Triumfglass.
column25: KAB förvärvar Sävedalens torg

column16: Stena Fastigheter has acquired Källfelt Byggnads AB. The acquisition includes a total of 1,350 residential units and 68,000 sqm of commercial space, including offices, shops and other businesses. The properties are primarily lcoated in Stockholm and Gothenburg.
column25: Stena förvärvar anrika Källfelt med 1.350 bostäder

column16: Ramsbury has acquired three fully leased educational properties totaling 8,518 sqm from Stiftelsen Viktor Rydbergs. The properties are located in Jarlaplan, Vasastan, and Djursholm. Price details were not disclosed.
column25: Ramsbury köpt tre i Stockholm

column16: Ytterbygg AB has acquired two industrial/commercial properties in Rollsbo, Kungälv, from Fairford Group. The assets total 2,500 sqm and are primarily leased to Ergofast AB, which will remain as a tenant post-transaction.
column25: Ytterbygg köper två i Kungälv från Fairford

column16: Hyresbostäder i Norrköping has acquired the residential property Dansbanan 1 in Sandtorp from Slättö Sveaviken Bostad for an underlying property value of SEK 173.5 million. The deal includes 117 rental apartments across five buildings.
column25: Hyresbostäder köper från Slättö Sveaviken

column16: Trianon has sold the residential property Onsjö 7 in Malmö, near Kronprinsen, to a private real estate owner. The property includes 40 apartments with a total lettable area of 2,077 sqm and generates annual rental income of SEK 3.8 million.
column25: Trianon säljer bostadshus nära Kronprinsen

column16: Storsala has acquired a property in Hagsätra, Stockholm, from Coeli Fastighet II. The property is currently an industrial site but is subject to an ongoing zoning plan aimed at enabling the construction of around 65 sustainable rental apartments with commercial premises at street level.
column25: Storsala förvärvar från Coeli i Hagsätra

column16: EQT has purchased the second phase of a planned residential area in Flemingsberg from Byggvesta. The new agreement involves 388 homes. Total investment amounts to SEK 1.6B.
column17: Initial yield for the first one is around 5.3%
column25: EQT köper etapp två i Flemingsberg

column16: K-Fast Kilen (51% K-Fastigheter, 49% Kilenkrysset) is acquiring a residential portfolio in Gävle and Uppsala from K-Fastigheter, comprising 288 units in management, 133 under construction, 176 with permits, and 242 in planning. Agreed property value of SEK 700M for completed investment properties and costs incurred for properties under construction corresponding to SEK 336M.
column25: K-Fast Kilen köper i Gävle och Uppsala

column16: riksbyggen has acquired a property in the Råa area of Helsingborg. The acquisition includes both land from the City of Helsingborg and a completed building plan from 3Hus. The new housing project will consist of 43 apartments, of which 8 are townhouses, distributed over 3 building blocks.
column25: Riksbyggen förvärvar mindre fastighet i Helsingborg

column16: Hines has acquired its first residential property in Sweden by signing a forward funding agreement with Magnolia Bostad for 310 rental apartments in Kista, Stockholm.
column17: They have been trying to sell this for 18 months. Expectations from Magnolia was around 5% yield with 5% forward funding rate. Assumed that Hines bought for cheaper than that.
column25: Hines slår till med premiärköp av bostäder – i Kista

column16: Klövern is acquiring two properties in Wendelstrand, and receives building rights for c. 200 homes with sales planned to start after the summer.
column25: Klövern gör vattennära köp i Göteborg

column16: Vendus has acquired a convenience store property in Stora Höga in Stenungsund from Steiner Fastigheter. Total lettable area amounts to c. 4,100 sqm and the largest tenant is Hemköp. Remaining contract length is c. 7 years.
column25: Vendus förvärvar från Steiner Fastigheter

column16: Revelop acquires a portfolio of three community properties in Greater Stockholm from Hemsö. The properties have a total lettable area of 8,000 sqm with mainly healthcare centers as tenants. The occupancy rate is 95%.
column25: Revelop förvärvar från Hemsö

column16: Active and Tarnhelm, via a joint venture, are selling Irsta Företagspark to an institutional buyer. The park comprises c. 12,000 sqm of premises and 36,000 sqm of land.
column25: Active och Tarnhelm säljer Irsta Företagspark

column16: Capman Infra's data center platform, soon to be launched under the name of Kolo DC, has agreed to acquire two data centers in Stockholm and one in Piteå from EcoDataCenter. These facilities offer Tier 3 redundancy, high security, state-of-the-art infrastructure and a clientele of reputable companies.
column25: Capman köper tre datacenter i Sverige

column16: Sätra Centrum was sold at an executive auction for SEK 50M to Fastighetsföräadlarna i Mälardalen AB. The company, which was one of the creditors of the bankrupt company that owned the property, now intends to renovate the asset.
column25: Sätra Centrum sålt på auktion

column16: As part of the development of Mölnlycke Fabriker, Wallenstam is selling a property with building rights to Obos. The building rights include the possible construction of c. 120 homes.
column25: Wallenstam säljer byggrätter i Mölnlycke Fabriker till Obos

column16: Vendus has acquired a property in central Degerfors from Kronhallen Fastighet AB. The property comprises 3,500 sqm of lettable area and has Ica as the largest tenant, accounting for 89% of rental value. The remaining contract period is 7 years.
column25: Vendus förvärvar livsmedelsfastighet i Degerfors

column16: Cibus divested a former Coop grocery store to the Municipality of Eslöv for an underlying property value of EUR 1.1M. The Municipality is planning to use the property for urban development.
column25: Cibus makes transactions in Sweden, Finland and Belgium

column16: NP3 has acquired four properties in three transactions primarily for industrial purposes. Annual rental value amounts to SEK 20.9M and the average occupancy rate is 87%. The average remaning term of existing leases amounts to 3 years. Two of the properties are located in Luleå and are being divested by Diös.
column25: NP3 köper fyra fastigheter för 216 miljoner

column16: Diös divested a residential property to Peritas. The property has an occupancy rate of 70% and a rental value of SEK 8.6M.
column25: Diös in business with Peritas for SEK 327 million

column16: Diös has acquired three properties in Sundsvall from Peritas, which consists of two offices and one real estate property. Lettable area amounts to 7,85 sqm, rental value amounts to SEK 19M and the occupancy rate is 97%.
column25: Diös i affärer med Peritas för 327 mkr

column16: ABG Fastena acquires two properties from Artis Fastigheter, one in Sölvesborg and one in Ljungby. In Sölveborg, the 2,300 sqm are leased to Rusta on a ten-year agreement, and in Ljungby, the 2,500 sqm are covered by ten-year lease agreements with Jysk and Thansen.
column25: ABG Fastena köper två från Artis Fastigheter

column16: Nivika has taken over a property via a sale-and-leaseback deal with Inev AB. The property consists of a total lettable area of 11,300 sqm. A 10-year lease agreement has been signed, with an annual rental value of c. SEK 7.M.
column25: Nivika förvärvar för 105 miljoner i Vaggeryd

column16: Active Fastighet is selling two properties in Flen to an established player in industrial properties. The properties have a total area of c. 8,500 sqm and 31,000 sqm of land.
column25: Active säljer i Flen

column16: Regio sold a portfolio of 7 properties located in Stockholm and Gothenburg to Greykite. These are industrial and business properties with a vacancy of 10%.
column25: Nya Greykite storköper från Regio

column16: ADR Fastigheter acquires a property from a private owner in Österlljunga. Th property is fully let to Vianor.
column25: ADR Fastigheter köper i Örkelljunga

column16: Acrinova acquires an undeveloped plot in Landskrona. They have acquired a property in the same area previously, where they are now building a new facility for warehousing and logistics.
column25: Acrinova köper i Landskrona

column16: Heba has signed an agreement with Credentia to acquire a new nursing home property in Norrtälje. The property will consist of 60 apartments and has a total leasable area of 4,491 sqm. It is fully let to Attendo with a 15-year lease which runs until 2041. Annual rental value amounts to SEK 11,652M, including rental income from 15 parking spaces.
column25: Heba förvärvar för kvarts miljard i Norrtälje

column16: Derome sells three apartment buildings with a total of 60 homes to Brännborn Fastigheter. The rental apartments are spread over two four-story buildings and one three-story building.
column25: Derome säljer tre hyreshus och tecknar avtal med Hemsö

column16: NWT acquires two properties in Karlstad from Stenhus Fastigheter for SEK 350M. One of the properties consist of 12,800 sqm of office spaces. The other is a retail property of c. 1,700 sqm which is leased to Coop and Apoteket. The retail property includes a future building right for residential properties of c. 6,000 sqm.
column25: NWT förvärvar två i Karlstad för 350 mkr

column16: Stenhus Fastigheter acquired a property with an underlying property value of SEK 52M. The property is within the warehouse, light industry and logistics segment, and has a rental income of c. SEK 3.9M. It is fully leased to XL Bygg with a contract length of 8.2 years.
column25: Stenhus förvärvar för 52 mkr – och säljer för mer

column16: Prisma Properties have signed an agreement with NP3 to acquire three retail properties in Kiruna, Sundsvall and Gävle for SEK 463M. The occupancy rate is 96% with an annual rental value of SEK 42.8M. Discount retail and grocery stores account for 33% and 32% of rental income, respectively.
column25: Prisma förvärvar tre från NP3 för 463 miljoner

column16: Emilshus enters Skåne by acquiring 35 properties from Acrinova. The properties consist of 70% light industry and warehouses with a total leasable area of 124,000 sqm. Economic occupancy rate is 95% and the average remaining lease term is 4.7 years. The portfolio includes three project properties which have an expected completion around the turn of the year 2025/2026.
column25: Emilshus i storköp för 1,4 miljarder från Acrinova

column16: SLP has acquired a property in Gothenburg for an agreed property value of SEK 625M. Early in the sales process, the previous tenant IAC Group went bankrupt. A few weeks ago it was announced that the Indian Tata is buying IAC. The lease agreement signed has a term of c. 12 years and a rental value of SEK 39.6M.
column17: We used to own this property, more a factory rather than logistics
column25: SLP förvärvar för 625 mkr i Göteborg

column16: NP3 Fastigheter has acquired five properties in three transactions, primarily for industrial purposes, at a property value of SEK 219M. The leasable area amounts to 22,600 sqm and annual rental value amounts to SEK 19.4M. The average occupancy rate is 94% and average remaining term of existing leases is 6.3 years.
column25: NP3 förvärvar för 219 miljoner – via tre affärer

column16: Storsala has acquired an office property in Märsta from HSB, in collaboration with co-owner Lindesbergs Bygg AB. Storsala plans to develop the property with c. 100 rental apartments, with a gross area of 6,350 sqm and a living area of 4,800 sqm.
column25: Storsala förvärvar kontorshus från HSB

column16: Logistri acquires two light industrial properties in Gothenburg from Verde Fastigheter. The properties are fully leased and have a total lettable area of 6,700 sqm. Annual rental income amounts to SEK 7.1M with a remaining average contract length of 4 years.
column25: Logistri i förvärv om 113 mkr

column16: The project in Partille comprises a total of 337 homes, of which Lansa is acquiring 221 rental units. Peab will be responsible for the construction. The first move-in is expected to take place in 2028.
column25: Lansa köper 221 bostäder i Partille från Peab

column16: Genova has signed an agreement to divest a property with newly created residential building rights. The deal includes the property Odalmannen1, which was acquired in 2017 at an underlying property value of SEK 11M. At the time of the acquisition, the property was fully leased, and since then, Genova has worked actively with the municipality to develop building rights for apartment buildings and townhouses. The detailed plan is expected to be adopted in 2025.
column25: Genova avyttrar för 28 mkr

column16: SLP acquires two logistics properties in Haninge from Kilenkrysset. The properties have an agreed property value of SEK 465M and have a total lettable area of 24,000 sqm. They are fully leased, and have a total annual rental value of c. SEK 29.5M.
column17: Skandia in both locations. Sub market level rent. We liked the locations when we looked at it
column25: SLP köper för nära halv miljard från Kilenkrysset

column16: IBAB is purchasing the property Simonsen 11 in central Borås from SBB. The property consists of two buildings and is currently leased for the most part by the City of Borås.
column25: IBAB köper av SBB för 91,5 miljoner

column16: Nrep acquired 231 apartments in Årsta Park in Uppsala, which will soon start construction. The transaction is being carried out in collaboration with Bonava, which is both selling and developing the project. The upcoming rental apartments in Årsta Park are spread over five building.
column25: Nrep köper för 485 mkr i Uppsala från Bonava

column16: Bain capital is investing SEK 1.6Bn in Företagsparken. As part of the transaction, Bain Capital has acquired 15.9% of the existing shares. Företagsparken owns and manages a diverse portfolio of more than 200 properties with a focus on light industrial and last-mile logistics located in urban locations across Sweden.
column25: Bain Capital går in i Företagsparken med 1,6 mdr

column16: OTPP has completed the acquisition of a 92,000 sqm logistics portfolio from funds managed by Blackstone. The portfolio comprises three assets in Sweden and two in Denmark. The acquisition is undertaken together with Fokus Nordic.
column25: Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan acquires 92,000 sqm prime logistics portfolio in Sweden and Denmark

column16: Älvstranden Utveckling is selling the Terminal Property to the city's development administration. The property contains a total of 189,000 sqm of land and a building with c. 50,000 sqm of lettable area. The current building was built in 1963 and mainly contains warehouse and logistics operations, but there are also car rental companies, a large Ahlsell operation and a co-kart track.
column25: Säljer för 850 miljoner i Göteborg

column16: Alecta Fastigheter acquires the leasehold of the property known as Klara Strand from M&G Real Estate. The building has a leasable area of 34,000 sqm, and contains, among other things, offices, conference facilities, restaurants, student apartments and garages. The acquisition is a part of an exchange deal in which Alecta divests the small property Skravelberget Större 19 (3,283 sqm) to M&G.
column25: Alecta och M&G i stor bytesaffär i Stockholm city

column16: Logistea has entered into agreement to acquire two properties in Malmö through the acquisition of property-owning company, Coeli Grönsakshandlaren AB. The properties are fully leased to Golvpoolen and Skåne Stadsmission. The remaining average term is c. 5.3 years. The areas consists mainly of warehouses and retail. Annual rental income amounts to c. SEK 14.3M.
column25: Logistea köper i Malmö för 150 mkr

column16: Genova has signed an agreement to divest two properties with newly created residential building rights with an estimated volume of approximately 15,400 sqm. The buyer is Obos, who wants to develop 145 new homes. The properties are currently used for school acitivities, with a lettable area of 8,158 sqm.
column25: Obos köper för 323 mkr i södra Stockholm

column16: BRF buys property on Södermalm for SEK 170M from a private owner. The property consists of 64 residential apartments with a total area of 2,384 sqm and two commercial premises of 239 sqm.
column25: Brf köper fastighet på Södermalm för 170 miljoner

column16: Corem has signed an agreement to divest a portfolio of five properties in Halmstad for a total underlying property value of SEK 290M. The total lettable area amounts to c. 11,700 sqm, and consists mainly of office and warehouse premises. Rental value amounts to SEK 24.5M, and economic occupancy amounts to c. 89%.
column25: Corem säljer fem för 290 miljoner i Halmstad

column16: SLP acquires two newly built and fully leased logistics properties in Jönköping from Aspehof Fastigheter. The agreed property value amounts to SEK 266M, and the average rental duration for the properties amounts to 11 years and the annual rental value amounts to just over SEK 17M. The properties have a total lettable area of c. 19,300 sqm when the construction is completed, which is expected to be in June 2025.
column25: SLP köper för 266 mkr i Jönköping

column16: Arwidsro acquires retail properties in Överby Handelsområde in Trollhättan from Regio. The acquisition comprises 20,861 sqm of lettable area with a property value of SEK440M and a rental value of SEK 34.8M. The properties have an average lease term of over four years, and have an occupancy of 100%. Some anchor tenants are City Gross, Lidl, with complementary offerings in discount retail.
column25: Arwidsro köper handel för 440 miljoner i Trollhättan

column16: Pandox is purchasing Elite Hotel Frost with 154 rooms in Kiruna for SEK 347M. The hotel is in the final stages of completion and is expected to open to guests in June 2025. Elite Hotel has a 15-year turnover-based lease agreement. Stabilised yield of c. 7%.
column25: Pandox köper i Kiruna för 350 miljoner

column16: Fortinova has entered into an agreement in Varberg to acquire two properties from the Wohlén family. Leasable area amounts to 6,441 sqm, where the main use consists of retail, industry, warehouses and offices. The rental value is SEK 7.9M, and the operating net today amounts to just over SEK 6.4M with a 95% occupancy rate.

column16: Svenska Handelsfastigheter acquires a property in the Söderport shopping area in Värnamo from CA Fastigheter and Bofast, part of Gabrielsson Invest. Total lettable area is 11,000 sqm with tenants such as Rusta, Jysk, Blomsterlandet, and Thansen. Current management value amounts to SEK 19.4Bn.

column16: Diös acquires a portfolio of centrally located properties in Umeå from Lerstenen. The portfolio totals 73,000 sqm, and consists of Umestan's business park and two other office properties with a total occupancy rate of 96%. Rental value amounts to SEK 134M and the initial yield to 6%.

column16: Tingsvalvet has signed an agreement with Elisby Fastigheter to acquire the property known as K7 in Västerås. The agreed property value amounts to SEK 210M, with a direct yield amounting to just under 7.5%. The property is fully leased and the remaining contract length is 8.3 years.

column16: Petter Gyllenhammar has, through his company PGAB, purchased 340,324 shares in Link Prop Investment AB from Rutger Arnhult's M2 Asset Management. The buyer thus reaches 35.2% of the shares and a mandatory bid is pending.

column16: Amorina Hus AB chose to sell the residential property to the tenant-owner's association. The purchase price corresponds to a return of less than 3%. The property contains 2,260 sqm of lettable area, distributed over 48 apartments.

column16: Willhem acquires 371 newly built apartmetns in Bandhagen, Stockholm from Nordiska Bostad. The agreed property value is SEK 1,290M.

column16: Nrep has acquired 308 new rental apartments from a joined venture owned by Reliew and Derome. The apartments are due to be completed in 2027. The deal includes three properties and has a total lettable area of c. 13,900 sqm. Purchase price is not disclosed. Reliwe and Derome acquired the building rights from Wallenstam in the summer of 2024 for SEK 147M.

column16: Specialfastigheter has sold seven properties with a lettable area of 180,000 sqm to Fortifikationsverket. The properties are located primarily in Stockholm, and are currently fully leased. Annual rental value of the properties is estimated to be approx. SEK 395M.

column16: Nivika has, in two separate transactions, agreed to acquire a total of nine commercial properties on the West Coast, in Varberg and Falkenberg, and along the E4 outside Värnamo. column16: Irenmark Fastigheter has acquired three rental apartments in central Nynäshamn, totaling 3,799 sqm. The seller is Arne Carlsson Förvaltnings AB.

column16: Aedifica divested the rest of its portfolio in Sweden for SEK 454M to Nordiqus. The deal includes five preschools and one school in Nynäshamn, Eskilstuna, Norrtälje, Upplands Väsby, Älmhult and Ronneby. column16: Logistri aquires five newly built industrial properties from Torngrund. The properties have a total lettable area of 20,291 sqm and total property value of SEK 350M. They are fully leased with an annual rental income of SEK 27.7M and remaining average contract length of 11 years.

column16: Stenfastigheter purchased a newly built property containing 85 apartments and a restaurant in central Varberg. The seller is Magnus Månsson Fastighets AB. The purchase price is not disclosed.

column16: Flexfast acquired a property from SBB in Örebro. The property has a total lettable area of 2,500 sqm and a site area of c. 28,000 sqm.

column16: Flexfast acquired a logistics property from Kåkå. The property has a total lettable area of 6,300 sqm and a site area of c. 23,000 sqm.
column25: Flexfast köper två i Örebro

column16: Trianon enters into a transfer agreement with Briban, regarding the divestment of properties with a property value of SEK 1,062M. The portfolio consists of primarily of residential properties but also office properties. The total leasable area amounts to 47,000 sqm and annual rental income is estimated to total SEK 74M.

column16: Hemsö and Lantmännen Fastigheter's jointly owned company, Lanthem, has acquired a community property in Eslöv with the police as largest tenant. The property has an area of 6,000 sqm and is fully leased to the police and Avonova Health.

column16: Heitman LLC has acquired a major stake in the third largest self-storage operator in Sweden - Servistore. Servistore currently operates in 25 locations, with 6 new locations planned to open, in 14 cities. In total, the operation encompasses over 4,000 units, spanning a total of 30,000 sqm of storage space.
column25: Heitman tar över Servistore – Arnhults M2 säljer

column16: Skandia is selling the building rights for residential properties at Ballongberget to Besqab. The building rights are for approximately 130 apartments (c. 10,000 SQM GFA). Production will start at the end of 2025, with estimated completion in 2028.

column16: KKR has bought three multi-family properties under development in Haninge from Reliwe and Derome Group. The new production consists of three new properties with a total of 382 homes. Which are expected to be completed between end of 2026 and beginning of 2027.

column16: Capman has acquired Midstar's hotel portfolio, comprising of 28 properties in the Nordic region. The price is not disclosed, but the properties were valued at SEK 10.5 billion last year. 16 of the hotels are located in Sweden, 4 in Denmark and 8 in Norway.

column16: The Swedish Prison and Probation Service has carried out a landlord procurement for a new detention center to be built in Gävle and has decided to award the contract to Intea. The new detention center will contain 110 detention rooms, offices and premises for the national transport unit. The lease agreement runs for a lease term of 25 years from completeion. The project is expected to be completed in 2029
column25: Intea bygger häkte om 22.000 kvm i Gävle

column16: Norrman & Son has acquired three light industrial properties in Västerås and southern Stockholm in a sale and leaseback deal. The seller and purchase price is undisclosed. The buyer and seller have signed a 10-year triple net lease agreement.

column16: Corem sells eight properties in Halmstad to Emilshus for SEK 520 million. The total leasable area amounts to 47,300 sqm and consists mainly pf premises for offices, industry and warehouses. The rental value amounts to SEK 53M and the economic occupancy rate amounts to approx. 93%.
column17: Been on the market for quite some time.
column25: Corem säljer åtta i Halmstad till Emilshus för 520 mkr

column16: Wihlborgs is acquiring eight properties from Granitor with occupancy on April 1, 2025. The price is SEK 2.4B. The six investment properties were built between 2007 and 2022, and cover a total of approx. 51,000 sqm. Where approx. half of the leasable area is offices and half is hotels. The two development properties cover 82,000 sqm of land for operations and 12,000 sqm of GLA for offices.
column25: Wihlborgs köper för 2,4 mdr från Granitor

column16: Insig buys 13 properites in northwestern Skåne from Gösta Bengtsson Fastighetsförvaltning. The deal includes a total of 13 properties with a total lettable area of 10,184 sqm, divided into 152 homes. The properties are located in Perstorp, Båstad and Örkelljunga.
column25: Insig köper 13 fastigheter i Skåne

column16: Logistea acquires the property Automobilen 1 in Nyköping for SEK 450M. The property consists of 44,900 sqm of warehouse and light industrial space, with Nyköping Municipality as the tenant under two lease agreements with six years remaining.
column17: One of the tenants is X-shore, they are struggling financially. Yield of around 12%. Location is fairly good.
column25: Logistea förvärvar i Nyköping för 450 mkr

column16: Olav Thon Gruppen has purchased the property Lagern 7, at Vasagatan in Stockholm, also known as Journalisternas hus. column16: Fortifikationsverket has acquired a padel hall in Ronneby from Havsklippan. The padel facility is medium sized with six courts. It opened in May 2023.

column16: SBF Fonder has, through SBF Institution AB, sold the property Plasternackan 1 to Bra Bostad for SEK 60M. The property consists of 50 apartments and 1 premise with a total area of 3,734 sqm.

column16: Humlegården has acquired the office property Skålen 30, better known as Fenix, from Invesco Real Estate, with its local partner Fokus Nordic. The property has a total leasable office space of just over 18,000 sqm, and is currently fully leased. This is Humlgården’s first acquisition in 5 years. The yield was 4.25%. Fokus/Invesco: profit: c. 700MSEK (acquisition 1-1.1 bln + investments 800 MSEK).
column17: Was looked at by Brunswick with Partners group. We put in a bid but was outbid by Invesco. In Hagastan, very attractive location.

column16: Revelop has taken over the property Vildanden 8, a community property with c. 8,000 sqm of lettable area. The property is located in Limhamn and primarily has operations within healthcare and municipal operations.

column16: Hagabacken has acquired three properties in Gävle and two properties in Vallentuna. It is estimated that the purchase price was just under SEK 400M.The properties in Gävle has a total floor area of 17,600 sqm, and those in Vallentuna total 5,500 sqm. The properties have been acquired from two different sellers, one in each town.

column16: Vendus has expanded its portfolio of commercial properties through two separate transactions. In Umeå, the property Sävar 10:59 has been acquired.

column16: Catella has sold a property in Gothenburg to an unknown buyer for SEK 40M. The property consists of 20 residential units and 48 SQM of office space.

column16: Emilshus acquired two light industrial properties with a total leasable area of 14,859 sqm. Total annual revenue amounts to SEK 19M, with an average remaining lease term of 13 years. One property is located in Ljungby next to E4 and is leased to Kalmar Solutions AB. The second property is a vacant building in Marks. Emilshus has signed a 10-year lease agreement with Malwa Forest.

column16: The newly started company South Bay, led by, among others, Nrep founder Rickard Svensson Dahlberg, has acquired a logistics property of 44,000 sqm in Malmö. The property is now fully leased.
column17: First deal for South Bay, which was founded by NREP founder and some of his colleagues at NREP. Has been turbulent at NREP. Based on this investment seems like it is a core fund.

column16: Hoivalilat, part of the Belgian group Aedifica, has signed an agreement to sell 22 LSS properties located primarily in the Mälardalen area and in southern Sweden. The average lease term is over 10 years.

column16: Infranode acquires school property in the Södra Änggården district of Gothenburg from Platzer. The school covers 10,000 sqm and it was sold for 552 million. It is fully leased to Internationella Engelska Skolan, which signed a 20-year contract with an annual rent of 29 million.

column16: Svenska Hus has entered an agreement to sell two properties in Gothenburg, which according to MSCI has a total area of 2,169 sqm. Bolix Kommersiella Fastigheter is the buyer. The tenants of the property are Swedbank, Fastighetsbyrån, Arbetsförmedlingen and Prolympia.

column16: Ås Härads Fastigheter acquires 138 apartments in central Borås from a private seller. Rentable area amounts to approx. 8,000 sqm.

column16: Stendörren acquires two warehouse and light industrial properties in Södertälje from Serafim Fastigheter for 80 million. Occupancy of Arbetsledaren 1 is estimated to be January 15 2025, while Åkerkullan 2 has been occupied.

column16: Could not find more information regarding this transaction other than the information on MSCI. Of the 2,818 sqm, 2,308 sqm is residential and the remaining is retail.

The building will be demolished to make way for housing when the detailed plan becomes legally binding. There will be approximately 350 new homes on the property.

column16: Could not find more information about this transaction other than the information on MSCI, but I found more information regarding the building on Hemsö's website. Pjäsen is Gotland's largest retirement home with a total of 100 apartments over four floors, and common areas.

The Arkaden project is located in Råbylund, about three kilometers from Lund's city center. The development will offer approximately 11,000 square meters of leasable space.
column25: Skanska säljer bostäder i Lund till LF för halv miljard | Fastighetsvärlden

column16: Skanska has sold the self-developed office building Least2 in Luleå for approximately SEK 240m. The buyer is Luleälven Fastigheter AB, owned by the pension funds of LKAB, Sandvik, Skanska, and the Göranssonska Foundation. The parties have previously conducted several transactions together.
column25: Skanska säljer till Luleälven i Luleå för 240 mkr | Fastighetsvärlden

column16: Stendörren Fastigheter has acquired the warehouse and light industrial properties Bårhult 1:121 and 1:122 in Härryda Municipality from a private seller. The agreed property value is SEK 127 million, with a total leasable area of 6,400 sqm. The properties, built in 2020 and 2023, are fully leased to two tenants under long-term agreements. The annual net operating income is estimated to exceed SEK 8 million. The expected possession date is December 16, 2024.
column25: Stendörren köper två i Göteborg för 127 mkr | Fastighetsvärlden

column16: Bror Johansson & Co AB is selling some of its properties in Lunden, one of Gothenburg's most popular residential areas, to Ernst Rosén AB, which already manages a larger portfolio in the area. The transaction is being carried out through a company transfer. The total leasable area is approximately 11,000 sqm, consisting of 164 apartments and several commercial spaces.
column25: Ernst Rosén förvärvar 164 bostäder i Göteborg | Fastighetsvärlden

column16: Infranode acquires 29,000 sqm in Telestaden. Major tenants are the Police Authority, Attendo and a veterinary clinic. Ikano Bostad and Rikshem have been developing Telestaden since 2015 with the aim of creating a modern and attractive district, and they chose to divest two of the properties to Infranode. When Telestaden is completed, it will have approximately 2,000 homes and 1,200 workplaces, preschools, schools, and cultural life.
column25: Infranode köper 29.000 kvm i Telestaden

column16: Brinova Fastigheter and K-Fastigheter have entered into an agreement in which Brinova acquires K-Fastigheter's property-owning companies in Skåne, Småland, and Denmark. Payment will be made through newly issued shares in Brinova, valued at the net asset value as of September 30, 2024. The contracted rent is SEK 534.9m, with a property value per square meter of SEK 35,300. The vacancy rate is 5.1%, and the rental value for residential units is SEK 1,898 per sqm. The expected loan-to-value ratio upon completion is 59.7%, and the estimated average direct yield, based on external valuations, is 4.4%. The portfolio consists of 65% modern properties completed after 2019.
column25: Brinova köper för 10,8 mdr från K-fastigheter | Fastighetsvärlden

column16: Tingsvalvet has signed an agreement with Förvaltix Fastigheter, a company within the Norrman & Son group, for the indirect acquisition of eleven properties in Eskilstuna. The agreed property value is approximately SEK 325.7m after deduction of latent taxes, with a direct yield of just over 7.5%.
column25: Tingsvalvet köper elva i Eskilstuna för 325 mkr | Fastighetsvärlden

column16: Besqab has taken possession of the land for the upcoming Tegelwik project on Södermalm, which will include 93 condominium apartments and two commercial spaces. The purchase price is approximately SEK 322m, and the project will be carried out as a jv with ALFA Development as the capital partner. The Tegelwik project will feature around 9,400 sqm of residential space and approximately 130 sqm of commercial space. Construction is set to begin in Q4 2024, with the first move-ins expected in 2027.

column16: Stenhus Fastigheter has acquired two properties for SEK 104.2m (Sala: Pronordic, Borlänge: n.a) and sold one in Gävle for 30 million SEK, exiting that market as part of its consolidation strategy. In addition to the large outlet of 17,000 square meters, the acquisition also includes a property in the vicinity that hosts tenants such as Jysk, Stadium, Husqvarna, Dressmann, Kappahl, Lindex, Cervera, and Rusta.

column16: Folksamgruppen, through KPA Pension, acquired Vasahuset (the properties Kortbyrån 19 and Kortbyrån 20) in central Stockholm from DNB for SEK 3,039 m. The leasable area for the two properties amounts to just over 21,000 sqm and the transfer will take place on November 1, 2022. The deal is one of the largest ones in the CBD when it comes to piece deals.

Akelius Residential Property acquired 40 m shares in Castellum from M2, controlled by Rutger Arnhult. This corresponds to 12.2 % of the total number of shares in Castellum AB, excluding shares directly owned by the company. M2's ownership amounts to the equivalent of 6.1 % of the capital and votes in Castellum (Arnhult also owns shares in Castellum via Corem). The price was SEK 115 per share, a total of SEK 4.6 B, or EUR 424 m.

column16: Niam acquired stora Kruthuset 17 of 68,000 sqm premises in central Gothenburg, near the train station. The price is not disclosed but FV assumes it to be around SEK 1.8B-1.9B, a record high deal in the area. Majority of the premises are offices and among the tenants there are Tullverket, PostNord, Trafikverket, and CGI. The vacancy rate is low, rental levels around 2500 SEK/sqm. The property is certified according to Breeam Very Good.

VenCura has sold a portfolio consisting of five public-use properties in Karlshamn and one in Gävle. 85% of the rental income comes from municipal tenants and WAULT amounts to approx. 5 years for the portfolio.
Vasakronan has sold Diktaren 1 in Solna. An old deal, negotiated in november 2021. The International English School is the tenant on a 15 year long contract. Estimated yield of 3.1%.

Intea Fastigheter acquires 57 % of the shares in Kalkstenen Fastighets AB where the seller is Arne Lorentzon. The properties are Stora Mörke 18 and Ringaren 6, Högskolan is the largest tenant. The combined leasable area of the two properties amounts to approximately 27,700 sqm.The occupancy rate amounts to 100 percent, of which the proportion of public tenants is 98.5 percent. The rental value amounts to a total of SEK 42.3 m per year and the average contract period for the leases amounts to 3.6 years.

column16: KlaraBo acquired a residential portfolio from Niam consisting of 877 rental units. The deal was communicated in july and was conditional on the loan agreement being entered into on the terms in accordance with the credit decision before closing. KlaraBo has now entered into a loan agreement according to the terms and thus completes the deal. The acquisition is financed with bank loans with a maturity of three years at a fixed interest rate of a total of 1.4 percent and existing cash.

column16: SBB divests seven properties in different Swedish municipalities in three different transactions. The sale price amounts to approximately SEK 186 million. The underlying property value exceeds book value by 3 percent, SBB said. Rental value of approximately SEK 14.8 million per year, tenants are a mix of commercial tenants, public tenants and residential tenants. The proceeds from the sales are intended to be used to repurchase bonds.

AF gruppen won the land allocation competition in Roslagens hamn of 21,500 sqm ljus BTA building rights, with total land area of 4,150 sqm. In addition the deal included a property on the pier in the harbor of 1,000 sqm ljus BTA with right of use for commercial premises. Construction is expected to start in 2025.

column25: https://www.fastighetsvarlden.se/notiser/trio-far-bygga-30-000-kvm-i-bromma/

column16: Peter Kollberg sells eight properties through his company Mölnlycke Fastighets AB. The properties are located in central Mölnlycke and the yearly rent value amounts to approx. SEK20.6m.

RE Equity Fund AB won the bidding in the land allocation for 280 residential units (HR). In total there were ten bids for the land allocation, 10230SEK/sqm being the second highest and 5250 SEK/sqm being the lowest.

Folkhem won the land allocation for 130 residential units, 12000 sqm ljus BTA (BR). They will pay 13053 SEK/sqm ljus BTA for residentials and 4000 SEK/sqm ljus BTA for commerical premises. Folkhem and another party left the same offer but Folkhem won after the draw, the third highest offer was at the price level 13000SEK/sqm.  The land allocation is a part of Fokus Skärholmen.
SPG acquired building rights for 260 residential units with garage on the ground floor. The building rights are located in central Gävle, 500 meters from the central station.

Areim acquired six light industrial properties from Stenhus in backa industrial area in Gothenburg and Jordbro industrial area in Haninge. Their current light industrial portfolio now consists of 51 properties, 175 000 sqm in Stockholm, Uppsala and Gothenburg. The portfolio also consists of unused building rights and ongoing building construction.

Barings held the property, Located next to Sturegallerian in Stockholm, for two years. They have during the time renewed 64% of the contracts and renegotiated many of the existing ones. In addition, they have made the preparations to transform the current attic into 400 sqm office spaces. There is also potential to rent out spaces on the court yard

A sale lease back deal with the underlying property value is approx 74 M, incl. fourthcoming investment in the freezer equipment. The property, which totals approximately 31,000 sqm of land, has the potential for further expansion.The annual rent is fully indexed and amounts to SEK 4.7 million with a remaining contract term of 12 years
Serafim has acquired two properties in Södertälje. The acquisition includes 5,500 square meters of land with a total lettable area of approximately 1,800 square meters. The deal is a sale lease back

16 properties located in Helsingborg, Skellefteå, Skövde, Sundsvall and Umeå. NOI of ~60 SEKm, yield of 6.5%. 150 SEKm financed through a non-cash consideration, the rest with equity and bank loans.
New JV between Fastator and Broadgate Asset Management. Broadgate to be responsible for management. Focus on commercial cash flow assets and ambition to grow by 1 SEKb/year.

96,000 of land sold by the municipality, located in strong logistics area outside of Landskrona right by the E6/E20. Five properties located in Bjuv, Lund and Ängelholm with a WAULT of 4 years. Coop and ICA among the tenants. Financed through a non-cash consideration of 55 SEKm, making Sven-Olof Johansson/Compactor one of the largest owners, controlling 5% of the shares.

2 properties in Lund, one in Örkelljunga and one in Helsingborg. Property in Örkeljunga let to McDonald’s and Circle K and with a building right of 10,000 sqm. Partly financed through a directed issue of 130 SEKm and an offset issue of 18 SEKm.
Grand Hotel, sold by Vectura (Patricia/Investor) to FAM, owned by the three largest Wallenberg foundations.
Property located in Eriksberg and currently being renovated to host Donnergymnasiet which has signed a 15 years lease, moving in December 2021.

One retirement home and one preschool in Onsala, south of Kungsbacka, sold by two individuals through a company transaction. Neighboring properties and fully let to the municipality with a WAULT of 6.5 years.

Three properties in Eslöv, mainly residential. Value-add case with potential to improve the apartment’s standard by relocating tenants. Blended yield estimated to 4.5% (gross). Signatur’s total portfolio now valued at 1.2 SEKb. Aiming to grow it to 2.0 SEKb by the end of 2021.
22,000 sqm portfolio valued at 550 SEKm, mainly social estate properties in Finland. Swedish part consists of 99 apartments in Malmö and Lund.

Property located in Bromma, close to Alvik subway station. With 16 floors and 182 smaller apartments, the property was initially used as student housing but is currently fully let to Forenom, which operates it as a long-stay hotel.

Sveafastigheter to develop 127 rental apartments in Nya Oxbackens centrum, Västerås. Land sold by local actor.
13 residential properties, 10 in the central parts of Skellefteå and 3 in Bureå, 20 km south of Skellefteå. NOI of 5.52 SEKm, no price disclosed.

Industrial property located close to Landvetter and let to Liseberg AB. Catena owns a neighboring property and plans to develop 210,000 sqm of logistics in the area, focusing on high-profile architecture and sustainability.

Project of 83 Nordic Swan Ecolabel-certified rental apartments to be finalized in 2023, located in the new residential area Tomtebo Gård. Building right acquired from the municipality. Construction of 106 rental apartments to start during the fall of 2021.
Property located at the quayside in Finnboda, Nacka. One property of 1,400 sqm currently let as office and one building right of 1,300 sqm, to be used for residential development.

Two properties. One social estate property of 750 sqm rented by Vårdstyrkan AB and one mixed-use property of 2,000 sqm with five different tenants, one of them being a car dealership. Second property includes a building right.
Four buildings with a total of 248 student housing apartments located close to Karlstad University. Buildings expected to be classified as CICERO’s light green, in accordance with K2A’s framework.

Lansa and ICA Fastigheter has agreed on a LOI regarding the residential part of a 20,000 sqm development site. Lansa to buy what will become 258 rental apartments whereas ICA will maintain the commercial part of the project.

Aquisiton by Blackstone’s European core fund. Property almost fully let and located 700 meters from a planned subway station for the new blue line to Nacka. Spotify the largest tenant. Scius to be managing the property. Fastighetsvärlden estimating the price to 900-1000 SEKm (~77,200 SEK/sqm).

Odd Molly to acquire the main warehouse for a leading e-commerce actor through a sale-leaseback on a 12 year lease. Development potential for additional logistic facilities. Details to be announced as deal is finalized (May).
Three modern warehouse and logistic properties. Tenants include Beijer Byggmaterial, Manpower and MuoviTech AB. Estimated yield (gross): 6.6%.

New Ursusrem Atlas II acquiring Kungsholmsporten, two 20 storey buildings on each side of Essingeleden, together with minority partner Cavendo. Fastighetsvärlden estimating the price to 1,350 SEKm (65,370 SEK/sqm).
Old porcelain factory in Gustavsberg. Hemköp, Värmdö kommun and Framtidens Porslinsfabrik among the tenants. Plans to develop the facility focusing on clustering actors active within art and design.
Centrally located and newly constructed property sold by local actor. Mainly healthcare and office premises, Region Gäveborg, Folktandvården an Coop being the largest tenants.
Three properties sold through a land allocation process conducted by the municipality.
3 residential properties with a total of 92 apartments and development opportunity for 25 additional apartments.
Previous rental apartments to be organized as co-operative (77 apartments).
Property located on Frihamnspiren and sold by municipality owned Älvstranden. PEAB plans to add three floors and double the leasable area to 19,000 sqm of office premises.

Nyfosa is acquiring four commercial properties in Nacka, Norrtälje and Uppsala (657 SEKm) and is disposing of two development properties - one in Lund and one in Haninge (477 SEKm) - in a barter transaction with Genova.
Expected BTA of 51,000 sqm, K-Fastigheter aiming to develop 700 rental apartments.
16,500 sqm of land on the outskirts of Sigtuna. Zoning plan allowing for mixed commercial use, such as logistics, offics, retail and service and a BTA of 40,000 sqm.
Praktiska Gymnasiet the largest tenant. Additional building right with an expected BTA of 32,000 sqm, K-Fastigheter aiming to build 350 apartments using their concept “Lamellhus”.
Residential building rights in Huvudsta. Suggested zoning plan allowing for 250 co-op apartments and 30 row houses.
Logistics property located in Viared, a logistics area outside of Borås. Fully rented, PR Home the largest tenant.
Newly constructed residential property with 32 rental apartments.
SHH and Fabege divesting 130 newly produced rental apartments in Kista, including 4 commercial units.
Modern office facility fully rented to, among others, Sweco, Skanska, Mockfjärds and Borlänge municipality.
JV between Slättö Core+ and Sveaviken Bostad acquired two properties with buildings rights in the central parts of Vegastaden,. 230 rental apartments to be constructed.
Vasaparken (Åhman, Linköping) bought one property in Gamla Stan, previously leased by Europaskolan (AB Parts & Paomees). Property to be transformed into office facility.
46 rental apartments. Old stock located close to Möllevången. Significant investments made by the seller before divestment. Vita Örn owns 7 additional properties in Malmö.
100,000 sqm of land outside of Enköping. Zooning plan allowing for industry, warehouse and logistics development.
Tenants include Optimera, Trafikverket and Formo. WAULT of 7.5 years. Located close to both the E6 and the E22.
Block that until the fall of 2020 hosted St Erik’s Eye Hospital, to be transformed by Skanska into housing, office and service premises with a BTA of 41 000 sqm, corresponding to 36,590 SEK/BTA.
ALM Equity’s subsidiary Småa selling remaining 34 residential plots out of the 82 initially developed.
Zoning plan allowing for residential development. Construction of 230 rental apartments to start in the middle of 2022.

Diös is acquiring three office buildings in central Borlänge and is disposing of three mixed properties - one in Borlänge and two in Gävle - in a barter transaction with NP3. The underlying value of the acquired properties amounts to 110 SEKm (8,500 sqm) and the value of the properties being disposed of is 125 SEKm (13,000 sqm).
The old production and HQ site for textile producer Almedahl which later was transformed into a business park, today hosting around 30 companies.

Logistics property developed and sold by Skanska to Genesta in 2019, the price at that time being 285 SEKm. Located in Malmö Industrial Park, Norra Hamnen, close to the E4/E20. BentallGreenOak´s first transaction in Sweden.
Sale-leaseback. Other tenants in addition to the seller.

Land plot in Tornby. JSR has signed leases with Jem & Fix and Nordic Wellnes.
Old powerplant in Nacka with 26,000 BTA for co-op apartments. Located next to the planned subway station in Nacka.

KF Fastigheter selling 50% of the shares in Bro Mälarstrand Bostad AB. The JV will develop a new residential area in Bro including residential premises, a school as well as infrastructure. Total BTA of 80,000. Construction to start in 2022.

150,000 sqm land located in Huvudsta to which Mälarbanan will be extended. Two properties in Tornby industrial area, to be financed in part by a directed issue of 15 SEKm. Yield estimated to 6.25% (gross).

Building right. K2A to develop 3 wooden buildings, 6, 8 and 10 floors, with a total of 130-160 rental apartments. Mimer is a residential company owned by Västerås Municipality.

Mixed portfolio of 21 properties located in Staffanstorp (13), Lund (2), Malmö, Alingsås, Arvika, Karlskoga, Ronneby and Vimmerby, Jem & Fix being the tenant in many of the latter properties. Building right, 42,590 sqm of land. Castellum planning to build 20,000 sqm logistics.
Converted multi-use premises in an old industrial area on Lindholmen. Conditional offer with regards to the acceptance of a new zooning plan in 2023-2024. Seller owned by the municipality.
Two properties fully rented with a 3 year WAULT, double- and triple-net leases. Transaction to be financed through a directed issue of 25 SEKm. Yield estimated to 6.7% (gross).

Three industrial properties in Gårda, Göteborg with leases expiring in 2024. Plans to develop >30,000 sqm of office and residential premises. Site located close to where Citygate is being constructed.

1,800 sqm rented by a school, 1,800 sqm vacant. Zooning plan allows additional 2,000 BTA of residential/commercial premises. Seller a non-disclosed private actor.

Swedish Logistic Property, SLP, has acquired another large warehouse and logistics property in Malmö. The tenants include Strongpoint, NetONNet, and Fraktkompaniet.
Heimstaden has acquired 559 homes and a school in Eskilstuna. Before the acquisition is completed, approval is also needed by the municipality.

Offentliga Hus has entered into an agreement with SBB for the sale of 7 well known properties in Halmstad and 2 properties in Borås, for a price of SEK1.16bn, being 7% above SBB's last valuation. The portfolio has a total vacancy of 4% and the majority of it comes from government entity.

column4: Helsingborg Stad, Perstorps Kommun, Bjuvs Kommun, Båstads Kommun, Klippans Kommun, Höganäs Kommun, Ängelholms Kommun
column16: 7 municipalities have signed an agreement to buy the the existing airport company, and will take over airport operations from 1st September.

Botrygg has purchased 5 properties in Storvreta centre of Uppsala municiaplity.The agreed property value is SEK80m, with an additional price for the development of 3 additional properties when the planning permission gains legal force.
Stadsrum has acquired 2 properties in Stockholm by Vasaparken, with tenants including grocery stores, services, restaurants, housing, hotels, offices, and garages. The economic occupancy rate is 96%.

Klippudden Fastigheter, part of the Holmström Group, has acquired 3,200sqm in Kalmar. The acquisition consists of a new production project of 24 townhouses, and a preschool with a 17 year lease with Kalmar municipality.
Stenvalvet has acquired Nybyggaren 1 in Hässleholm from a private property owner.

Postnord has signed an agreement with Barings for a sale and leaseback deal regarding a portfolio of logistics properties in Norrköping for SEK960m, which is PostNord's last directly Swedish property.

Magnolia Bostad has sold the first phase of the project Norra Kajen in Sundsvall, to Heimstaden Bostad. The project involves the development of approximately 360 housing units totalling approximately 21,000sqm of BTA. The planning permission for the development gained legal force in January 2019, and construction is expected to begin in the autumn of 2020 with occupancy in spring of 2023.
Mjöbäcks Entreprened and Järngrinden AB have signed an agreement with Fortinova Fastigheter for the sale of 138 rental apartments, in the Breareds area of Varberg.

SLP has expanded their portfolio in Nässjö, with their latest acquisition of a warehouse logistics property with tenants such as Riksbyggen and Privab. This brings their total ownership in Nässjö to over 90,000sqm.
BRF Martallen 25-26 has acquired the two plots Stockholm Martallen 25 and 26, consisting of 2 three storey blocks in central Midsommarkransen with 29 residential units.
Arne Lorentzon has sold a property in Skövde to its tenants, who have formed a BRF.

A development project consisting of approximately 10,250sqm BTA of student housing has been sold, with a 20 year agreement has been signed with the Gothenburg Student Housing Foundation. Upon completion, the rental value will amount to just over SEk16m per year.
K2A has acquired the property Växjö Slottstaden 4, next to Linnaeus University. The property consists of 113 student rental housing and rental value amounts to approximately SEK6m per annum.
SBB has sold the office property Flogsta 47Ö1 in Ekeby, Uppsala to Genoa.
Nyfosa has sold a commercial property in central Linköping, with a rental income of SEK9.2m, of which 60% comes from retail and a WAULT of 3.2 years.
Atrium Ljungberg has signed an agreement to acquire the office property Eken 14 in Sundbyberg, also known as the "Maraboukontoret".
Trianon has signed an agreement for the acquisition of 293 apartments in central Skurup.

Signatur Fastigheter AB has solde the plot Vallhumden 7 to the BRF Vallhunden in Rågsved. The plot consists of a multifamily with 57 apartments and surrounding farmland totalling 2,640sqm. The property was constructed in 2008 and previously consisted of 2 residential apartment buildings with 121 apartments.
Offentliga Hus has acquired 26,000sqm in Härnösand for SEK106m.
Skebo has acquired three central properties in Skellefteå with a total of 500 apartments, for approximately SEK900m.
Signatur Fastigheter has acquired 7 residential rental properties in Trelleborg with a GLA of 2,741sqm, consisting of 50 apartments with garage and parking spaces.
HIG has sold a logistics property in Kungsbacka to a Blackstone fund.
Car dealership fully let to one tenant. Estimated NOI of 5.3mSEK and WAULT of 9 years. Oscar properties announced that they had acquired this property in Feb-21, but the deal did not go through

Castellum has acquired an office property in Malmö from SBB, which is currently let to the Domstolsverket, who occupy 98% of the building. An additional SEK15m will be due in the event of further acquisitions before the end of September 2020 and access will be made available at the end of 2020.

SBB has sold 4 additional office properties to 4 other separate buyers, in the portfolio that was previously to be sold to Nyfosa, which includes the Castellum deal above. The sale exceeds SBB's Q1 2020 valuation by 6% and Hemfosa's Q3 2019 valuation by 17%.

column4: John Mattson Fastighets AB, Laterre AB
column16: John Mattson has agreed to acquire three tomträtterna which are fully ented to various tenants with an annual rental income of SEk4.8m, and the seller as the largest tenant. The plots are in Slakthusområdet, and John Mattson and LaTerre plan to jointly develop the plannning permission which is expected to gain legal force in 2022.

NCC has sold a project of 4 apartment buildings with a total of 60 apartments to the Collianderska Foundation, in a company sale. The apartments will be 1-3 roks in sizes ranging from 34.4sqm to 81.5sqm.
Northern Horizon's care property fund, Nordiska Vårdhem, has acquired a newly built property in Mumman, central Gävle, from ProNordic.
The local entrepreneur Christian Johansson of Bergeke has acquired 4 properties of 81 residential units in Kvänum from Vara Bostäder for SEK50m.
Hotel Östergyllen in Linköping has been acquired by Botrygg, where the hotel will be closed and converted into 34 apartment units and 1,168sqm of office space.
Fabege has acquired Påsen 1 in Hammarby Sjöstad from CapMan, with 8,270sqm of offices and 1,444sqm of industrial space.

K2A has signed an agreement to acquire Skärvet 11 in central Växjö, where Skanska will build a four-storey property with 56 rental units for a GLA of 3,650, with an estimated rental value of SEK7.3m. K2A intends to finance the acquisition through bank loans and equity, and the acquisition is conditional upon building permits being obtained.

Index Residence has sold their share of the building rights to Juvelen 2, in central Norrtälje to Arwidsro. Index has owned the building rights through Arkensvik, a JV between Index and Arwidsro. Arwidsro plan to build 130 rental apartments with 1 - 4 rooms, and the planning permission has gained legal force and construction is expected to begin around the turn of the year 2022 - 2021 with occupancy Autumn 2022.
Arrector has sold five centrally located residential properties in Eskilstuna with just over 50 apartment units. The acquisition is through a company acquisition with an estimated yield of below 4%.
Stenvalvet has made its first acquisition in Ronneby through acquiring Kilen 8 from Attendo Sweden.
BRF Kvarsta By acquired the proeprty Södertälje Litografin 3 from Telge Hovsjö. The deal included 126 townhouses in Hovsjö.

column4: Svenska Handelsfastigheter i Sverige Förvaltning AB
column16: Svenska Handelsfastigheter acquires two commercial properties in the Tornby trading area in Linköping. The properties have a GLA of 18,400sqm with 7 tenants. The vacancy rate is 40% as one of the properties is still under development. The WAULT amounts to approximately 7 years.

Slättö's Core+ fund has acquired a residential property on Gotland, with Gotland Region as a tenant. The property is split on 2 levels which is comprised of 30 residential units, several common areas, and premises for staff and administration. 14 years remain on the lease, and Attendo is the operator of the elderly care areas. The total annual rental income amounts to approximately SEK4.7m.

LudavikaHem's Board signed an agreement to acquire 3 properties, Heimdal 4, Pluto 9, and Älgkon 20, for SEK205m. The deal is pending municipal and city council approval, as well as financing. The properties consist of 148 residential units, and 3,814sqm of retail and 1,571sqm of offices.
Akka Egendom AB has acquired 18 residential properties with 258 units in Kristinehamn from Merx Fastigheter.

JM has sold 2 development projects in Västerås intended to have 69 units of surface efficient, Nordic Ecolabelled apartments. The projects will commence construction in Q2 of 2020 with completion planned for Q4 2021.
The three development properties Täby Tibble 10:8, 10:9, and Bergkristallen 1 have been acquired from TryggHem through a company transaction.
SBB has sold a housing portfolio of 1,259 apartments to Amasten.

Regio has entered into a share transfer agreement to acquire four properties with office and business premises in Uppsala, acquired through two separate transactions with Mellansvenska Logistiktransporter AB and Reminor, at a yield of 6.5%
HSB has sold Brigaden 1 to Asplunds Fastigheter in Örebro. HSB has built almost 300 BRFs in 6 different stages in the area.

K2A has signed an agreement to acquire the property Enköping Bredsand 1:353 from Acasa Bostad through a company acquisition. The estimated rental value is approximately SEK3.7m. Acasa will build 3 buildings each with 2 floors, totalling 34 residential units.
Four properties in Metropolitan Stockholm with an occupancy rate of 97% and an average rent of around 1,300 SEK/m2.
Four properties Metropolitan Stockholm with an occupancy rate of 97% and an average rent of around 1,300 SEK/m2
